name: Qwik Smol King
description:
You are but a smol king in a smol castle. The other king is stronger and he doesn't like yu! Ve must take from him... evvveryzing!

Short tutorial:

- click on own castles to upgrade them

- click on enemy castles to attack

- click on chest to retrieve it

Tips:

- if the army is on march, it will consume gold. Also, only one army from one castle can be on the march at once (a castle cannot send two armies)

- make sure you have defense.

- armies cannot attack each other on the map (they are stupid like that)

- gold is the only resource that can be below 0

- to conquer a castle, you need to get its defense to 0 (if yours gets to 0, it is also conquered). The army that conquers the castle becomes the defense.

Known issues:

- AI is stupid

- chests sometimes spawn outside the game area and sometimes it is visible when the code moves them inside the playing area.

- it is really hard to conquer other castles, but it is possible... somehow...  FIXED

- the attacking/defending needs a bit more work. FIXED?

This game was made in 3 days. I hope you enjoy!

Daniel
